name: Shape Click
description:
Hello Everyone, This Is My First Python Project. As I Would Like To Say I Coded This All By Myself. I Recycled A Clicker Guide And Rebranded It A Bit. I Would Say It's A Good Start For My First Python Game.

As This Is My First Python Game, I Don't Know If This Officially Works On Every Platform But I Do Know It Works For Windows, So That's Super I Guess.

The Original Game Is By CrazyMakes Called Clicky Click

https://python-forum.io/thread-26740.html

As I Progress Through Learning Python My Projects Will Become Better And Better I Hope, They Won't Always Be Like This
